snippet: City Council members on Tuesday gave final approval to a bill that would make it easier for gay couples who marry in Washington to get divorced.
abstract: City Council of the District of Columbia approves bill that would make it easier for gay couples who marry in Washington to get divorced.
lead_paragraph: City Council members on Tuesday gave final approval to a bill that would make it easier for gay couples who marry in Washington to get divorced.

headline.seo: D.C. Bill Allows Non-Resident Gays to Gain Divorce
headline.main: D.C. Bill Allows Non-Resident Gays to Gain Divorce
headline.print_headline: Bill Allows Non-Resident Gays To Gain Divorces In District

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
